1370: Ghoris moved to Oly straetje.B.0 after marriage.
Got married to Ricmoden at age 22 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Ricmoden, Aue, at age 23.
Lost daughter Aue when Aue was 1 years old.
1375: Had a daughter with Ricmoden, Itsburgis, at age 27.
1378: Had a son with Ricmoden, Lambrecht, at age 30.
Lost son Lambrecht when Lambrecht was 1 years old.
1382: Had a daughter with Ricmoden, Tetta, at age 34.
1385: Had a daughter with Ricmoden, Esa, at age 37.
